title: Mitel security advisory (AV25-449)
description: On July 23, 2025, Mitel published security advisories to address critical vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: MiCollab  versions 10.0 (10.0.0.26) to 10.0 SP1 FP1 (10.0.1.101) and version 9.8 SP3 (9.8.3.1) and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
